posts.title: Brainwave Fitness Headband
posts.content: A better brain is just 3 minutes away with the brainwave fitness headband. The headband – known as Muse – is a brain fitness tool that allows you to do more with your mind by helping improve productivity, motivation, and even aiding in lowering stress levels.

posts.title: Happy Fucking Birthday Candles
posts.content: Stop counting years and focus on the celebration instead when you top off your cake with these “Happy Fucking Birthday” candles. The candles come in an assortment of vibrant colors and work great for those who like to keep their age a secret.

posts.title: Military Grade Rubber Bands
posts.content: Ensure your possessions remain securely bound together when you’re on the go by placing the military grade rubber bands on the job. Each band is made from bicycle tubes for unrivaled strength – making them an indispensable tool when venturing into the wild.

posts.title: Bluetooth Speaker Christmas Ornament
posts.content: Keep those insufferable holiday tunes blaring all month long with the Bluetooth speaker Christmas ornament. This high-tech rechargeable ornament allows you to customize your tree with full and crisp sound quality of your favorite holiday time hits!

posts.title: Pocket Water Filter
posts.content: The pocket water filter is the revolutionary new device every outdoorsman and adventurer should own. It’s lightweight, easy to transport, and made with superb craftsmanship. With just a few pumps you’ll be turning any water into drinkable water.

posts.title: Das Boot Beer Mug
posts.content: Celebrate Oktoberfest like a real German by drinking from DAS BOOT! This massive shoe holds 67 ounces, or roughly five beers in a single glass – enough to get you singing songs from the old country that you’re probably not even from.

posts.title: Stormtrooper Ice Cube Tray
posts.content: Chill your drink by unleashing the might of the empire with these stormtrooper ice cubes. The silicone ice cube tray lets you create up to half a dozen cubes in the form of Stormtrooper helmets great for placing a nerdy touch on any drink.

posts.title: Draft Beer Jelly Beans
posts.content: With the draft beer jelly beans you can enjoy the taste of an ice cold beer without having to deal with an awful hangover the next day. These gourmet jelly beans come flavored just like your favorite draft beers and are finished off with a nice golden coat.

posts.title: The Monster Towel
posts.content: Spend a day soaking up the sun without getting sand all over your body by laying out on the monster towel. This ginormous towel measures an impressive 10 x 10 feet and is made out of ultra soft microfiber that’s designed to fold up into a compact package.

posts.title: Shaving Cream Can Brush Adapter
posts.content: Streamline your shaving routine by spreading a nice even layer of shaving cream using this can brush adapter. It fits over the top of any pressure based shaving cream/gel can – keeping your hands foam free while reducing the amount of shaving cream used.

posts.title: Hands Free Dog Leash
posts.content: Taking your four legged friend on runs and jogs is more convenient than ever thanks to this hands free dog leash. It features an ergonomic load-dispersing design with a shock-absorbing leash, and even boasts a water-resistant pocket, and a water bottle holder.

posts.title: The Ultimate Karaoke System
posts.content: Bring the house down at your next performance when you hit the stage using the ultimate karaoke system. Apart from a Hi-fidelity 2.1 home theater system, it includes features like natural pitch-correction along with a realistic backup singers setting.
